<static> CeL.code.compatibility.is_HTA(id)
Are we run in HTA?
** HTA 中應該在 onload 中呼叫，否則 document.getElementsByTagName 不會有東西！
Parameters:
id Optional
HTA tag id (only used in low version that we have no document.getElementsByTagName)
Since:
2009/12/29 19:18:53
Returns:
We're in HTA
See:
http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms536479.aspx http://www.microsoft.com/technet/scriptcenter/resources/qanda/apr05/hey0420.mspx http://www.msfn.org/board/lofiversion/index.php/t61847.html lazy evaluation http://peter.michaux.ca/articles/lazy-function-definition-pattern

Are we in a W3C DOM environment?
Since:
2009/12/29 19:18:53
Returns:
